alert.note: Alert for Luzerne (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 9:26AM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Luzerne County through 1000 AM EDT... At 926 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Shumans, or near Berwick, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hazleton, Berwick, West Hazleton, Dorrance, Conyngham, Nescopeck, Slocum, Shickshinny, Jeddo and East Berwick. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 80 between 256 and 262. Pennsylvania Interstate 81 between 143 and 151A and B. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
